text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَجۡوَىٰهُمۡ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلۡغُيُوبِ
translation: Mbega none, izo ndyarya ntiziramenya ko Imana Allah Izi neza ivyo zihishije mu mishaha, hamwe n’ivyo zongorerana mu migambi mibi, n’uko Imana Allah Izi neza ibinyegejwe ibiremwa! Nta nkeka rero ko Izozihembera ivyo zakoze.
